Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.logic.controls

Class Selector

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.logic.controls.Selector
public class Selector extends Object
Represents a selector for UI elements and their associated event types. This class is used to manage the association between UI elements and the events they respond to.
